text: No antidepressants atm. I have to take breaks and alternate between the only 2 that work for me. I have to take my alprazolam daily tho or else Iâ€™d be hurting people.
I worked private duty for an elderly client who was in a nursing home and I can tell you these poor people barely get Tylenol. They cut my client of Alprazolam and it was a nightmare.
Alprazolam actually does its job when you don't abuse it
Go to a Sleep Management Doctor. Explain your situation. A combination of seroquel and alprazolam will guarantee you will get more sleep. No sleep is very serious condition.
